channel.title: Faction Suggestion [Coven]
channel.description:
The game starts with 3 members of the coven , they cannot recruit although they can still have the backing of the King .
First Witch
Passive: We are Witchs Three : As long as there are three witchs you are immune to night death and occupy .
Day Ability 1 : Curse -2 uses- Your targets body breaks out in boils .(message : you have been "cursed" by a witch!)
Night Ability 1 : Scry - Discover the class type of your target Night Ability 2: Improved Scry - Discover the class of your target , only useable on Hexed targets .
Second Witch
Passive: We are Witchs Three : As long as there are three witchs you are immune to night death and occupy .
Day Ability 1 : Hex - Cast a Hex on Your target becomes incredibly accident prone .( message :you have been "hexed" by a witch!) Day Ability 2: Foul Brew : Poison your victim, they will die in two days .
Night Ability 1 : Finger of Death : Kill your target , usable only on Marked targets .
Third Witch
Passive: We are Witchs Three : As long as there are three witchs you are immune to night death and occupy .
Day Ability 1: Mark - Your target is "Marked" for death , a terrible depression takes hold . (message :you have been "marked" by a witch.) Night Abiliy 1: Voodoo Doll - Occupy your target Night Ability 2 : Voodoo Puppet - Force your target to attack another player . usable only on cursed players .
Witch Hunter ( replaces sheriff or paladin )
Day Ability 1 : Burn the Witch!!!! (3 uses)- Immediatly cause a trial for your target .If they are executed they will show as a witch regardless of their class . ( they are still their original class ) . the user of this ability will be known by all .
Night Ability 1 : Witch Hunt - If your target is either a princess or a witch , they will show as potentially a witch! Otherwise they will show as not suspiscious .

item.title: Faction Suggestion [Coven]
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
The princess on the night result is to give a degree of misguidance .
Its meant to reflect the witch hunter being somewhat of a zealot and pointing the finger at anyone who they think could be a witch with very little evidence other than that they are a woman .
The old joke of testing for a witch by seeing if they burn when set on fire . If they burn , not a witch . If they don’t burn - a witch .

The whole idea I had for the witch hunter is that although he works for bd he is not a perfect tool .

It could easily be changed to be a vanilla sherrif clone but I just thought this might be fun .

Also as you say instavote is OP to balance this the witchhunter abilities are imperfect
